### Data Credit

The results and data shown in this work have been published by Liikkanen *et al.* in:

[Body movement as a digital biomarker in chronic pain rehabilitation: a real-world pilot study using virtual reality, Frontiers in Virtual Reality, 6, 1601823 (2025)](https://doi.org/10.3389/frvir.2025.1601823).
